data.text: @fernandof1974 @SheilaSobrany @filipinonurseuk @AntonEmmanuel2 @DrHNaqvi @Prerana_Issar @AmandaPritchard @CNOBME_SAG Not surprise at all. Being treated fairly seems to be a "PRN" option these days. Our poor Human Rights Act 1998 has gone through the window. Very very 😔

@knitknitqueen @fernandof1974 @filipinonurseuk @AntonEmmanuel2 @DrHNaqvi @Prerana_Issar @AmandaPritchard @CNOBME_SAG Here is the full report Efua if you havenâ€™t seen it already. At the back there is a breakdown of specifics inc dual heritage. https://t.co/d0saAz6VLY

@pattyrina1 @filipinonurseuk @AntonEmmanuel2 @DrHNaqvi @Prerana_Issar @AmandaPritchard @CNOBME_SAG I'm so sorry to hear this Patty. Please seek some support. @filipinonurseuk is here for you and your colleagues😇😇😇😇
@fernandof1974 This already told us what we already know but good to highlight it in a educational way. Will love to read the whole report. 👏🏻👏🏻

@Pollard1Jo Hi Jo. We are hoping that we can
share the research findings and recommendations widely. Will keep you posted.Thank you for your support😇😇😇
